actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to provide for grants to localities for their reasonable humanitarian and administrative expenses related to the presence of illegal aliens within their jurisdictions.
short_title: Federal Illegal Alien Grant-in-Aid to Localities Program Act

summary.text: Federal Illegal Alien Grant-in-Aid to Localities Program Act - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide grants to localities for costs incurred in providing humanitarian and administrative services to illegal aliens. Sets forth the terms and conditions for such grants. Authorizes appropriations for each fiscal year beginning with fiscal year 1981.

titles.title: Federal Illegal Alien Grant-in-Aid to Localities Program Act
A bill to provide for grants to localities for their reasonable humanitarian and administrative expenses related to the presence of illegal aliens within their jurisdictions.
